mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REQ_PUB ( PUB_CD, REQ_CD, COMMENT, CREATE_AUTHOR, CREATE_DATETIME, UPDATE_AUTHOR, UPDATE_DATETIME ) VALUES ( #{pubCd}, #{reqCd}, #{comment}, #{createAuthor}, current_timestamp(), #{updateAuthor}, current_timestamp() )
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM REQ_PUB WHERE PUB_CD = #{pubCd} AND REQ_CD = #{reqCd}
mapper.select: SELECT PUB_CD AS "pubCd", REQ_CD AS "reqCd", COMMENT AS "comment", CREATE_AUTHOR AS "createAuthor", CREATE_DATETIME AS "createDatetime", UPDATE_AUTHOR AS "updateAuthor", UPDATE_DATETIME AS "updateDatetime" FROM REQ_PUB WHERE PUB_CD = #{pubCd} AND REQ_CD = #{reqCd}

SELECT PUB_CD AS "pubCd", REQ_CD AS "reqCd", COMMENT AS "comment", CREATE_AUTHOR AS "createAuthor", CREATE_DATETIME AS "createDatetime", UPDATE_AUTHOR AS "updateAuthor", UPDATE_DATETIME AS "updateDatetime" FROM REQ_PUB WHERE PUB_CD = #{pubCd} AND REQ_CD = #{reqCd} FOR UPDATE

SELECT PUB_CD AS "pubCd", REQ_CD AS "reqCd", COMMENT AS "comment", CREATE_AUTHOR AS "createAuthor", CREATE_DATETIME AS "createDatetime", UPDATE_AUTHOR AS "updateAuthor", UPDATE_DATETIME AS "updateDatetime" FROM REQ_PUB WHERE 1 = 1 AND PUB_CD LIKE CONCAT('%', #{pubCd}, '%') AND REQ_CD LIKE CONCAT('%', #{reqCd}, '%') AND COMMENT LIKE CONCAT('%', #{comment}, '%') AND CREATE_AUTHOR LIKE CONCAT('%', #{createAuthor}, '%') AND UPDATE_AUTHOR LIKE CONCAT('%', #{updateAuthor}, '%') AND CREATE_DATETIME > #{createDatetime} AND UPDATE_DATETIME > #{updateDatetime} ORDER BY ${theOrderByCondition} GROUP BY ${theGroupByCondition} LIMIT ${theFetchStart} , ${theFetchSize}

SELECT PUB_CD AS "pubCd", REQ_CD AS "reqCd", COMMENT AS "comment", CREATE_AUTHOR AS "createAuthor", CREATE_DATETIME AS "createDatetime", UPDATE_AUTHOR AS "updateAuthor", UPDATE_DATETIME AS "updateDatetime" FROM REQ_PUB WHERE 1 = 1 AND ( ${pubCd} ) AND ( ${reqCd} ) AND ( ${comment} ) AND ( ${theSQLCondition} ) ORDER BY ${theOrderByCondition} GROUP BY ${theGroupByCondition} LIMIT ${theFetchStart} , ${theFetchSize}
